name: Reversal (RidaB)
description:
Simple, fun and addictive endless game!

Tap the screen to reverse the direction of the moving square while trying not to hit the walls.

Experience the fun of the color-changing effects!

Score your way up by collecting stars!

How far can you go?

Music by: https://boxcat.bandcamp.com/

WHAT'S NEW?

- Minor fixes
